description: Azure App Service PremiumV2 Plan having 1) Disk space utilized is lesser than 30 % of Disk space supported by "Basic" and 2) Memory Percentage is lesser than 30% of Memory Percentage supported by App Service Standard Plan are recommended to be converted to Azure App Service Standard Plan to save cost
display_name: Azure App Service Plan PremiumV2 To Standard Recommend
name: AZURE_APP_SERVICE_PLAN_PREMIUMV2_TO_STANDARD_RECOMMEND
